name: caty-equity-research-live
description: **Status (22 Oct 2025):** Site is live, publication gate currently **CLEAR**, valuation cards remain hidden under “NOT RATED” until refreshed Q3 inputs (deposit betas, COE, peer regression) are published alongside the sensitivity suite. Peer regression now runs on the eight-bank universe, and deposit betas are captured directly from inline XBRL via the new extractor. Remaining board asks (sensitivities, NIM bridge integration, evidence pack) are locked to the SLAs below.
